scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev -w apps/api" "npm run dev -w apps/web"
scripts.build: concurrently "npm run build -w packages/types" "npm run build -w packages/utils" && concurrently "npm run build -w apps/api" "npm run build -w apps/web"
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run deploy:web && npm run deploy:api
scripts.deploy:web: npm run build -w apps/web && sudo cp -r apps/web/dist/* /var/www/web/
scripts.deploy:api: npm run build -w apps/api && pm2 restart all
